# *English* 

### NYC Updates: 

Text COVID (for Spanish COVIDESP) to 692692

### Internet/Electronics:

**Spectrum** is providing free internet service to students without internet access - please call 1-844-488-8398 for further information.

**Electronics** NYC DOE is able to provide electronic devices for public health students who need them for rmote learning:  https://coronavirus.schools.nyc/RemoteLearningDevice

### Virtual Urgent Care:
**Virtual Urgent Care** from NewYork-Presbyterian lets you see a board-certified emergency or pediatric emergency physician* from Columbia or Weill Cornell Medicine right on your phone, tablet, or computer.

* Flexibility with services offered 7 days a week (8am-Midnight)

* https://www.nyp.org/ondemand/urgent-care 

### Food:

**Mamajuana Cafe** in the Bronx located at 3233 East Tremont Avenue will be providing a lunch bag for the children of our community from 11am-1pm and from 4pm-8pm.

Families can visit their nearest **DOE school** to pick up grab-and-go breakfast starting at 7:30 AM and lunch starting at 11:30 AM. Families can find their nearest school by visiting https://www.nycenet.edu/schoolsearch or by calling 311.

Beginning Monday 3/23, NYC students can pick up 3 free meals daily from 7:30AM-1:30PM Monday through Friday at 400 NYC sites.  https://schools.nyc.gov/freemeals

# *Español*

### Informe de Recursos en NYC:

Envíe un mensaje de texto COVID (para español COVIDESP) al 692692

### Internet gratis:

**Spectrum** ofrece servicio de internet gratuito a estudiantes sin acceso a internet; llame al 1-844-488-8398 para obtener más información.

### Atención Medica Virtual (comuníquese vía el internet):

**Virtual Urgent Care** de New York-Presbyterian le permite ver a un médico certificado de emergencia, sea pediatra o para adultos de Columbia o Weill Cornell Medicine directamente, por su teléfono, tableta o computadora.

* Flexibilidad con los servicios ofrecidos los 7 días de la semana (8 de la mañana a medianoche)

* https://www.nyp.org/ondemand/urgent-care

### Comida:

**Mamajuana Cafe** en el Bronx ubicado en 3233 East Tremont Avenue proporcionará una bolsa de almuerzo para los niños de nuestra comunidad de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. y de 4 p.m. a 8 p.m.

Las familias pueden visitar su **escuela DOE** más cercana para recoger el desayuno para llevar a partir de las 7:30 a.m. y el almuerzo a partir de las 11:30 a.m. Las familias pueden encontrar su escuela más cercana visitando https://www.nycenet.edu/schoolsearch o llamando al 311.
